<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1662488_pcpm_product_idea</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Set Submitted By</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	if (!current.submitted_by) {
  current.submitted_by = gs.getUserID();
	}


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-04-24 08:46:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>64368466c30de610302c5f2b2b01311c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Submitted By</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Plumbing Company Product Management" source="x_1662488_pcpm">42081bcec3c92210302c5f2b2b01316e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Plumbing Company Product Management">42081bcec3c92210302c5f2b2b01316e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_64368466c30de610302c5f2b2b01311c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-04-24 08:46:28</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=64368466c30de610302c5f2b2b01311c"/></record_update>
